title: Home
description: Tina is a content management platform, with a content management API and frontend toolkit to rapidly prototype your own CMS.

hero.headline: Content editing for modern teams
hero.subline: Tina is an open-source CMS admin that talks to any API

valueProps.headline: Edit content, *in the context of your site*
valueProps.subline: Just click on the page and type. Contextual toolbars and panels appear at just the right times to create the content you want.

valueItems.headline: Page building
valueItems.subline: Pick from your custom predefined components to build web experiences, blazing fast

valueItems.headline: Design Systems
valueItems.subline: Build pages with YOUR design system. Maximize reusability.

valueItems.headline: Improve Time-to-Market
valueItems.subline: Better creative control, donâ€™t rely on developers to make content changes.

demo.headline: Build with *your components*
demo.subline: Let your team build great layouts with your own React components.

features.headline: Avoid Vendor Lock-In
features.subline: Add visual editing to your site for logged in users.

items.headline: Tina comes with editing.
items.subline: Super simple, just click and edit.

items.headline: Headless Cms
items.subline: Sync your website data to a headless CMS of your choice

ecosystem.headline: Explore the *Tina ecosystem*
ecosystem.subline: More than just a headless CMS, Tina has all the tools for building web experiences for interdisciplinary teams.

valueItems.headline: Data Source Plugins
valueItems.subline: Data Source plugins allow you to extend Tina to connect to different databases and 3rd Party APIs

valueItems.subline: Extend primary fields with custom field plugins to completely control the editing experience and functionality.
